com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener

    public class FLabel
extends FComponent
    Represents a label that can String Note that html characters are encoded Use super class FHTML to render html-code as such
    Author:
    uli, as
